plot: Melissa has been in a wheelchair her entire life and has always been ridiculed and humiliated by her classmates, until one faithful day when her class is assigned presentations to their parents.
title: The Wonders of the World
plot_es: Melissa has been in a wheelchair her entire life and has always been ridiculed and humiliated by her classmates, until one faithful day when her class is assigned presentations to their parents.
plot_en: Melissa has been in a wheelchair her entire life and has always been ridiculed and humiliated by her classmates, until one faithful day when her class is assigned presentations to their parents.
